Class GradebookManagerHibernateImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      • org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport
        • org.sakaiproject.component.gradebook.BaseHibernateManager
          • org.sakaiproject.tool.gradebook.business.impl.GradebookManagerHibernateImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GradebookManager, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GradebookCalculationImpl

    public abstract class GradebookManagerHibernateImpl
extends BaseHibernateManager
implements GradebookManager
    Manages Gradebook persistence via hibernate.

    • Method Detail

      • removeAssignment

        public void removeAssignment(Long assignmentId)
                      throws StaleObjectModificationException
        Description copied from interface: GradebookManager
        Removes an assignment from a gradebook. The assignment should not be deleted, but the assignment and all grade records associated with the assignment should be ignored by the application. A removed assignment should not count toward the total number of points in the gradebook.
        Specified by:
        removeAssignment in interface GradebookManager
        Parameters:
        assignmentId - The assignment id
        Throws:
        StaleObjectModificationException

                               Collection gradeRecordsFromCall)
                                 throws StaleObjectModificationException
        Description copied from interface: GradebookManager

        public List getAssignmentsAndCourseGradeWithStats(Long gradebookId,
                                         String sortBy,
                                         boolean ascending)
        Description copied from interface: GradebookManager
        Same as the other getAssignmentsWithStats except for tacking the CourseGrade (with statistics) at the end of the list. This is combined into one call as a way to avoid either exposing the full enrollment list for the site or fetching it twice.
        Specified by:
        getAssignmentsAndCourseGradeWithStats in interface GradebookManager

      • getTotalPointsInternal

        public double getTotalPointsInternal(Long gradebookId,
                            Gradebook gradebook,
                            List categories,
                            String studentId)

      • getTotalPointsInternal

        public abstract double getTotalPointsInternal(Gradebook gradebook,
                            List categories,
                            String studentId,
                            List<AssignmentGradeRecord> studentGradeRecs,
                            List<Assignment> countedAssigns,
                            boolean literalTotal)
        Specified by:
        getTotalPointsInternal in interface GradebookManager
        Parameters:
        gradebook -
        categories -
        studentId -
        studentGradeRecs - - the AssignmentGradeRecords for the given student
        countedAssigns - - the Assignments in this gradebook that are counted toward the course grade. use getCountedAssignments(Session, Long)
        Returns:
        the total points possible for the given student. if the grade rec is null or doesn't exist for a counted assignment, then that assignment does not count toward the course grade for this particular student.

      • createAssignment

        public Long createAssignment(Long gradebookId,
                    String name,
                    Double points,
                    Date dueDate,
                    Boolean isNotCounted,
                    Boolean isReleased,
                    Boolean isExtraCredit)
                      throws ConflictingAssignmentNameException,
                             StaleObjectModificationException
        synchronize from external application - override createAssignment method in BaseHibernateManager.
        Specified by:
        createAssignment in interface GradebookManager
        Parameters:
        gradebookId - The gradebook ID to which this new assignment belongs
        name - The assignment's name (must be unique in the gradebook and not be null)
        points - The number of points possible for this assignment (must not be null)
        dueDate - The due date for the assignment (optional)
        isNotCounted - True if the assignment should not count towards the final course grade (optional)
        isReleased - True if the assignment should be release/ or visble to students
        isExtraCredit - True if the assignment is for extra credit
        Returns:
        The ID of the new assignment
        Throws:
        ConflictingAssignmentNameException
        StaleObjectModificationException
